Ingredients.1: 0.25 cup LAND O LAKES® Butter with Olive Oil and Sea Salt, melted

Ingredients.4: 4  LAND O LAKES® Eggs, at room temperature, lightly beaten

Ingredients.6: 1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh dill weed

Ingredients.8: 0.25 tablespoon LAND O LAKES® Butter with Canola Oil

Directions.1: Heat oven to 425 degrees F. Brush 12 popover cups with 1 tablespoon melted butter. Place pan in oven 5 minutes.

Directions.2: Combine remaining 3 tablespoons butter, flour, milk, eggs, chives, dill and salt in bowl; mix well. Pour batter into preheated popover cups, filling about half full. Bake 25 minutes. (Do not open oven door during baking.)

Directions.3: Remove from oven; poke top of each popover with sharp knife to release steam. Serve warm with Butter with Canola Oil, if desired.
